fields.title: The Godfather
fields.description: An aging patriarch of an organized crime dynasty transfers control of his empire to his reluctant son.

fields.title: The Godfather Part II
fields.description: The early life and career of Vito Corleone in 1920s New York is portrayed while his son expands the family crime business.

fields.title: Pulp Fiction
fields.description: The lives of two mob hitmen, a boxer, a gangster's wife, and a pair of diner bandits intertwine in tales of violence.

fields.title: The Dark Knight
fields.description: Batman faces a criminal mastermind who seeks to undermine Gotham through chaos and psychological manipulation.

fields.title: Se7en
fields.description: Two detectives hunt a serial killer who uses the seven deadly sins as the basis for his murders.

fields.title: Inception
fields.description: A skilled thief leads a team into the subconscious of their targets to steal or implant ideas through shared dreams.

fields.title: Interstellar
fields.description: A team of explorers travel through a wormhole in space in an attempt to ensure humanity's survival.

fields.title: The Matrix
fields.description: A hacker discovers the reality he lives in is a simulated construct and joins a rebellion against its controllers.

fields.title: The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring
fields.description: A meek hobbit sets out on a journey to destroy a powerful ring and save Middle-earth from darkness.

fields.title: Titanic
fields.description: A romance develops aboard a doomed ocean liner between two passengers from different social classes.
